description: Slow-cooked beef ribs are the hero of this birria-inspired recipe. These deliciously sticky ribs are paired with cheese and baked inside soft tortillas.
name: Cheat’s Birria-Inspired Tacos Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 800g Woolworths COOK slow cooked beef ribs in sweet ’n’ smokey BBQ sauce

recipeInstructions.text: Reserve sauce sachet from beef ribs packet, then microwave ribs according to packet instructions.
Meanwhile, combine tomato, onion and coriander in a medium bowl.
Add beef to a large pot with reserved sauce, chipotle and stock. Bring to a simmer, then remove pan from heat. Remove meat from ribs, then roughly shred using 2 forks. Discard bones.

Heat a large frying pan over medium-low heat. Dip 1 tortilla, at a time, into sauce mixture to coat. Lay tortilla in pan, then place 1/4 cup beef and 1/4 cup cheese on one half of the tortilla. Fold in half to enclose. Repeat with 1 more tortilla. Cook tortillas for 2 minutes on each side, or until tortillas are crisp. Repeat with remaining tortillas, beef and cheese.
Top tacos with salsa, then serve with remaining sauce mixture.
